content: As an alternative to public transportation during non-business hours in Grabs, you may consider taking taxis or ridesharing services like Uber or Lyft if available. Another option is to rent a bike from a local bike-sharing service or even rent a car if you have a valid driver's license. Walking may also be an option depending on the distance and time of day. It is always advisable to plan ahead and research options before traveling to ensure a safe and reliable journey.
